mapper.select: select lead_id , del_yn , created_by , created , last_upd_by , last_upd , reg_chnl_cd , con_type_cd , spec_desc , pros_id from lead
select count(*) from lead ld, prospect pros where ld.pros_id = pros.pros_id

select lead_id , del_yn , created_by , created , last_upd_by , last_upd , reg_chnl_cd , con_type_cd , spec_desc , pros_id from (select rownum rn , lead_id , del_yn , created_by , created , last_upd_by , last_upd , reg_chnl_cd , con_type_cd , spec_desc , pros_id from lead order by last_upd desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}

select lead_id , reg_chnl_cd , con_type_cd , pros_nm , cell_ph_no , cell_ph_tno , cell_ph_pno , eml_id , eml_domain from ( select rownum as rn , x.lead_id , x.reg_chnl_cd , x.con_type_cd , x.pros_nm , x.cell_ph_no , x.cell_ph_tno , x.cell_ph_pno , x.eml_id , x.eml_domain from (select a.lead_id , a.reg_chnl_cd , a.con_type_cd , b.pros_nm , b.cell_ph_no , b.cell_ph_tno , b.cell_ph_pno , b.eml_id , b.eml_domain from lead a, prospect b where a.pros_id = b.pros_id order by a.last_upd desc, b.pros_nm ) x where rownum < 8 ) where rn > 2
